channel.title: Satvik's Portfolio
channel.description: A blog on the current financial stories through the eyes of a kid

item.title: Collapse of Lehman Brothers
item.dc:creator: Satvik Raman
item.description: The history of Lehman brothers dates back to 1884, when three German brothers started a general store in Alabama. Tailwinds from the US economyâ€™s growth, helped them grow to become the 4th largest investment bank in the country. We discuss how and why they eventually collapsed
